升级卡

Upgrade cards change the behavior of AE2 devices and machines, increasing their speed, improving their filter capacity, enabling redstone control, etc.

卡片组件

卡片使用基础或高级卡片基座来合成

Crafting
Crafting

红石卡

Redstone cards add redstone control, adding a toggle button in the device's GUI to swap between various redstone conditions.

Crafting (Shapeless)

容量卡

容量卡会增加导入/导出/存储总线以及成型平面上的过滤槽位数量。

Crafting (Shapeless)

溢出销毁卡

Overflow destruction cards can be applied to storage cells in a Cell Workbench and will delete incoming items if the cell is full. (make sure to partition your cells!) Combined with an equal distribution card, items will be voided if that specific item's section of the cell is full, even if other items' sections are empty.

Crafting (Shapeless)

模糊卡

模糊卡允许带过滤器的设备/工具按耐久（损坏程度）过滤，并且/或者忽略物品 NBT。比如：无视耐久与附魔导出所有铁斧，或只导出受损的钻石剑（不导出完全修复的）。

下面示例展示了模糊耐久比较模式的工作方式：左侧为总线配置，上方为被比较的物品。

25%10% Damaged Pickaxe30% Damaged Pickaxe80% Damaged PickaxeFull Repair Pickaxe
Nearly Broken Pickaxe✅************
Fully Repaired Pickaxe****✅✅✅
50%10% Damaged Pickaxe30% Damaged Pickaxe80% Damaged PickaxeFull Repair Pickaxe
Nearly Broken Pickaxe✅✅********
Fully Repaired Pickaxe********✅✅
75%10% Damaged Pickaxe30% Damaged Pickaxe80% Damaged PickaxeFull Repair Pickaxe
Nearly Broken Pickaxe✅✅********
Fully Repaired Pickaxe****✅✅
99%10% Damaged Pickaxe30% Damaged Pickaxe80% Damaged PickaxeFull Repair Pickaxe
Nearly Broken Pickaxe✅✅✅****
Fully Repaired Pickaxe************✅
Ignore10% Damaged Pickaxe30% Damaged Pickaxe80% Damaged PickaxeFull Repair Pickaxe
Nearly Broken Pickaxe✅✅✅✅
Fully Repaired Pickaxe✅✅✅✅
Crafting (Shapeless)

加速卡

加速卡会让一切更快：使导入/导出总线每次操作搬运更多物品，并让压印机与分子装配室更快工作。

Crafting (Shapeless)

反转卡

反转卡会把设备/工具的过滤从白名单切换为黑名单。

Crafting (Shapeless)

合成卡

Crafting cards let the device send crafting requests to your autocrafting system to get the items it desires.

Crafting (Shapeless)

均分卡

Equal distribution cards can be applied to storage cells in a Cell Workbench and split the cell into equally-sized sections based on what the card is partitioned to. This prevents one item type from completely filling the cell.

Crafting (Shapeless)

能量卡

能量 cards add more energy storage to certain tools like portable terminals, and make Vibration Chambers more efficient.

Crafting
